text:
From: Martin Weinberg 
Sent: 8/13/2018 7:30:44 PM 
To: Jeff Epstein [jeevacation@gmail.com]; Martin Weinberg 
Subject: Fwd: Viceland 
Importance: High 
Fyi 
Sent from my iPhone 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: Matt Williams 
Date: August 13, 2018 at 3:15:32 PM EDT 
To: "Martin G. Weinberg" _________________ 
Subject: Re: Viceland 
Thank you Marty, 
The questions we wanted to reach out to Mr Epstein for comment are listed below. Feel free to contact me on 
fter reviewing. Kind regards - Matt 
A former employee has told us that Donald Trump attended Mr Epstein's Palm Beach estate on at least two occasions. Does Mr 
Epstein recall hosting Donald Trump at that residence? 
On one such occasion, it has been suggested to us that Mr Epstein and Donald Trump watched "young girls try on bikinis" while making 
comments on the their bodies." Does Mr Epstein have any comment? 
How does Mr Epstein respond to claims that women - some under the legal age of sexual consent - were used as "sex slaves" at his 
properties? 
A former employee of Mr Epstein has alleged to us that Mr Epstein sexually assaulted her on 
numerous occasions. Does Mr Epstein have a comment? 
Did or does Mr Epstein have cameras inside rooms at his Palm Beach residence? 
Did Mr Epstein remove those cameras before police raided the property as part of the investigation into alleged crimes? Did Mr Epstein 
ever hand over any recordings from any cameras at his properties to the authorities as part of his non-prosecution agreement? 
Does Mr Epstein have in his possession any video recordings of Donald Trump taken from inside his Palm Beach estate or any other 
residence? 
Did Mr Epstein hold sex parties at his residences involving girls under the age of sexual consent? Was Donald Trump ever present at 
any of these parties? 
Has Mr Epstein upheld the conditions of his sentencing and registered as a sex offender in all jurisdictions in which he is due to do so? 
Does Mr Epstein have any comment regarding allegations made by a woman named in the media as Virginia Giuffre/Roberts relating to 
her being sexually abused by Mr Epstein or used as a "sex slave"? 
ENDS 
On 13 August 2018 at 14:52, Martin G. Weinberg wrote: 
If you still want, send the questions. I would talk with you off the record after reviewing them (reserving the right at my 
option to make an on the record statement), hope that works for you. Marty 
From: Matt Williams 
HOUSE OVERSIGHT 022817 
Sent: Saturday, August 11, 2018 12:41 PM 
To: Martin G. Weinberg  
Subject: Re: Viceland 
Hello Martin, 
Thank you for getting back to me. We would be looking for on record comments or a "no comment" to our 
questions. But I am certainly happy to have an off record conversation with yourself as well. Perhaps we 
could set up a time to chat briefly off record on Monday before I send you our questions for Mr Epstein? 
Kind regards, 
Matt 
On 11 August 2018 at 11:08, Martin G. Weinberg 'wrote: 
Mr Williams, I am in receipt of your emails to Jackie Percyzk. If you first agree that any communications between you 
and me are off the record, I would be agreeable to receiving your questions or a clip of the episode that relates to Mr 
Epstein. Thanks.
